milestones.title: M0: Foundation
milestones.description: MCP protocol implementation, JSON-RPC handling, and basic Polygon client

milestones.title: M1: Core Tools
milestones.description: Stocks, reference data, and market status tools fully working

milestones.title: M2: Full Coverage
milestones.description: All Polygon.io endpoints (options, forex, crypto, indices) as MCP tools

milestones.title: M3: Production
milestones.description: Error handling, rate limiting, caching, documentation, and release
